doc.title: Half-Life
doc.plot: Tim, Matt and Dave have been surfing together for years and surf-tripping to Bali, Australia, the Canary Islands, the Maldives, but they keep going back to far north Scotland for the empty peat-infused waves and cold point-breaks of the rugged coast. This film is about their trips, the surfing, the injuries, the surf spots and the fun these 40-somethings guys have had in north Scotland under the shadow of the nuclear reprocessing plant at Sandside. Would you go in the water if you knew the facts?
